item.description:
Let's join the Boston Pub Crawlers Meetup & Bostons Most Eligible Meetup for a CLASSY pub crawl.

What does that mean??

That means while you don your sexiest cocktail outfit (including something comfortable to walk in), the boys of Bostons Most Eligible Meetup will be in their tuxedos & 3-piece suits! They don't have 'feet-hurting' concerns like we do :-).

Ultimately, no matter what you wear, the important thing is that you come out to drink and be merry!!

We’ll end our night at a classy bar at Bond. Click here for information about Bond. The current schedule is as follows

2:00 p.m. – Mass Ave Tavern (94 Mass Ave)
3:00 p.m. - Dillon's (955 Boylston Street)
4:00 p.m. - Cactus Club (939 Boylston Street)
5:00 p.m. - McGreevy's (911 Boylston Street)
6:00 p.m. - Pour House (907 Boylston Street #21)
7:00 p.m. - Lir (903 Boylston Street)
8:00 p.m. - Whiskeys (885 Boylston St)


Here is a link to the original pub crawl:
http://www.meetup.com/Pub-Crawlers-of-Boston/events/84035332/
item.name: 4th Annual Boylston Street Pub Crawl - Ultra Classy Style
